titles.title: To repeal the per-State limitation applicable to grants made by the National Endowment for the Arts from funds made available for fiscal year 2002.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Select Education.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

term.name: Federal aid to the arts and humanities

bill.summary: 2/6/2002--Introduced. Amends the Department of the Interior and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2002 (Public Law 107-63) to repeal a limitation on the portion of National Endowment for the Arts grant funds which may be made available to any single State.
